sen.j: 中嶋 猛夫（なかじま たけお、1947年 -）は、日本の環境デザイナー。
sen.e: Takeo NAKAJIMA (1947 -) is a Japanese environmental designer.
Takeo NAKAJIMA (1947 -) is a Japanese environmental designer.
Takeo NAKAJIMA (1947 -) is a Japanese environmental designer.

sen.j: 女子美術大学芸術学部デザイン教授・同大学大学院美術研究科教授。
sen.e: He is a professor of Department of Design of College of Art and Design of Joshibi University of Art and Design, and Fine Arts Course of Graduate School of Art and Design of Joshibi University of Art and Design.

He is a professor of Department of Design of College of Art and Design of Joshibi University of Art and Design, and Fine Arts Course of Graduate School of Art and Design of Joshibi University of Art and Design.

He is a professor of Department of Design of College of Art and Design of Joshibi University of Art and Design, and Fine Arts Course of Graduate School of Art and Design of Joshibi University of Art and Design.

sen.j: 専攻は、環境デザイン・宗教空間・景観論と設計。
sen.e: He majors in environmental design, religious space, landscape, and planning.
He majors in environmental design, religious space, landscape, and planning.
He majors in environmental design, religious space, landscape, and planning.

sen.j: 東京都生まれ。
sen.e: Born in Tokyo.
Born in Tokyo.
Born in Tokyo.

sen.j: 東京芸術大学美術学部工芸科工業デザイン専攻卒業。
sen.e: Graduated from Department of Design of of Faculty of Fine Arts of Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music (the present name: Tokyo University of the Arts), majored in industrial design.
Graduated from Department of Design of of Faculty of Fine Arts of Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music (the present name: Tokyo University of the Arts), majored in industrial design.
Graduated from Department of Design of Faculty of Fine Arts of Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music (the present name: Tokyo University of the Arts), majored in industrial design.
sen.cmt: 余分なofを削除しました。

sen.j: 同大学大学院美術研究科デザイン専攻博士課程修了（博士）。
sen.e: Completed his doctoral course in Department of Fine Arts of Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music, majored in design (Doctor of Philosophy).
Completed his doctoral course in Department of Fine Arts of Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music, majored in design (Doctor of Philosophy).
Completed his doctoral course in Department of Fine Arts of Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music, majored in design (Doctor of Philosophy).

sen.j: 東京芸術大学、女子美術大学助教授を経て現職。
sen.e: He was in Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music and Joshibi University of Art and Design as an assistant professor, and then assumed the present post.
He was in Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music and Joshibi University of Art and Design as an assistant professor, and then assumed the present post.
He was in Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music and Joshibi University of Art and Design as an assistant professor, and then assumed the present post.

sen.j: 自動車デザイナーに憧れ東京芸術大学へ進学するが、公害問題を抱えた日本社会を目の当たりにし、環境デザインを志す。
sen.e: Having been ambitious to be an automotive designer, he went on to Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music, but as he become aware that Japanese society has an environmental pollution issue, he decided to seek a career in environmental design.

Having been ambitious to be an automotive designer, he went on to Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music, but as he became more aware that Japanese society had an environmental pollution issue, he decided to seek a career in environmental design.

Having been ambitious to be an automotive designer, he went on to Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music, but as he became more aware that Japanese society had an environmental pollution issue, he decided to seek a career in environmental design.

sen.j: 以来、エコロジーデザインとは何かを提唱する。
sen.e: Thereafter, he had been advocating what the ecology design is.
Thereafter, he had been advocating what the ecology design is.
Thereafter, he had been advocating what the ecology design is.

sen.j: 京都桂離宮、修学院離宮にて造園実務に携わり、寺院境内の研究をする一方、国内外の庭園を多数設計。
sen.e: He participated in business of landscape gardening at Katsura Imperial Villa (or, Katsura Detached Palace) and Shugakuin Imperial Villa (or, Shugakuin Detached Palace) in Kyoto and studied the precincts of Buddhist temples, while designing many gardens in Japan and overseas.

He participated in a landscape gardening business at Katsura Imperial Villa (or, Katsura Detached Palace) and Shugakuin Imperial Villa (or, Shugakuin Detached Palace) in Kyoto and studied the precincts of Buddhist temples, while designing many gardens in Japan and overseas.

He participated in a landscape gardening business at Katsura Imperial Villa (or, Katsura Detached Palace) and Shugakuin Imperial Villa (or, Shugakuin Detached Palace) in Kyoto and studied the precincts of Buddhist temples, while designing many gardens in Japan and overseas.

sen.j: 宗教空間、寺院建築に関する研究論文を多数発表。
sen.e: He has presented many papers on religious space and temple architecture.
He has presented many papers on religious space and temple architecture.
He has presented many papers on religious space and temple architecture.
